name: handoff-default
description: Default handoff format template defining required sections and per-agent customizations

sections.name: DONE
sections.description: What was implemented - specific files, functions, behaviors changed

sections.name: TESTS
sections.description: Test count, coverage percentage, what is tested

sections.name: CONCERNS
sections.description: Risks, fragile areas, tech debt introduced. Even 'none observed' is valid but must not be empty

sections.name: DEVIATED
sections.description: Any departures from task spec and WHY. 'None' if exact match

sections.name: DISCOVERED
sections.description: Unexpected findings about codebase, dependencies, or patterns. Must not be empty

sections.name: NEXT
sections.description: What should happen next - specific follow-up suggestions

constraints: All code must pass existing tests
Do NOT modify files outside ownership scope
If cross-domain change needed, note in NEXT section
